title: Women in kimono
creator_credit: Koga Productions and Japan. National Tourist Organisation
brief_description: A look at Japanese culture showing the influence of nature in all spheres of life. With no narration, using only Japanese music as background, the film shows the design of fabrics for kimonos, the making of delicate porcelain, silk screen painting and ikebana.
